Params: {3: 'Seeking a way to cross the bridge, you have returned to the city ruins outside, where the Support Force has established a temporary base of operation.'}
{3: 'You inform Bridget about what went down at the bridge...'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'So you got dumped on the other end of it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'That bridge you mentioned, what does it look like? How far is it from one side to the other?', 4: '1'}
{3: "Liv holds onto Bridget's hand and sends her the last recorded images."}

{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I've got here with me a few short-range jet engines. They aren't what's usually equipped on Constructs as they come with much more power and much less stability, and its suitability... Well...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "Can't say for sure. I may be able to endorse it based on the models of your frames, but for humans, you won't know it until you've tested it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "As you can see, we're quite busy up here. You'll have to do the testing yourselves.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Commandant, let me take care of this.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After numerous tests, you finally manage to find a suitable flight device.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Now we can cross the drawn bridge.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bridget', 3: "Hold on, the place you're heading is much further below. The return trip's gonna be difficult.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: 'So take more supplies with you. Gears and consumables, everything. Just in case.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bridget leads you to a heap of Supply Crates.'}
{2: 'Bridget', 3: "I told the folks to grab the most suitable resources for y'all. They're all equipment that suits your frames, so grab as many things as you can!", 4: '1'}
{3: "You all go Supply-Crates-diving in front of Bridget's watchful gaze."}
